Text: I wish they'd post a normal size (350-700mb) release as well. Downloading these massive HD files takes forever and sometimes they stress my CPU and over heat it.

Well, global warming doesn't come from CO2. The 'hockey stick' is a big fraud from the IPCC fuckers who want to keep getting funded by the governments. Look up 'climategate' and how Dr. Mann made up his diagrams and results.
